sameAnalysis.part_name: 这两个动词均含"悲伤，伤心"之意。
means: grieve ： 通常指因死亡、损失或失败等所造成的内心痛苦。可以是公开表达的，也可以是压抑于内心的。
mourn ： 正式用词，含义与grieve很相近，但侧重因某种原因而表现于外表的悲伤、哭泣。

sentence.Network_en: When the government is finally brought down, no one will mourn its passing.
sentence.Network_cn: 当政府最终垮台之日，将不会有人为它的消亡而悲哀。

sentence.Network_en: As the nation continued to mourn, the new President of South Africa paid his own tribute.
sentence.Network_cn: 举国仍在哀悼之际，南非新任总统也表达了自己的怀念之情。

sentence.Network_en: Blessed are they that mourn, for they -- they -- "
sentence.Network_cn: 有福的人是那些哀恸的人, 因为他们 —— 他们 —— ”

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English murnan, of Germanic origin

entry.def: If you mourn someone who has died or mourn for them, you are very sad that they have died and show your sorrow in the way that you behave.

example.tran: 琼仍在为父亲的死伤心。

example.ex: The whole nation had mourned the death of their great leader...
example.tran: 举国向去世的伟大领袖表示了深深的哀悼。

entry.tran: 为失去…而悲哀;为…感到遗憾
entry.def: If you mourn something or mourn for it, you regret that you no longer have it and show your regret in the way that you behave.

example.ex: We mourned the loss of our cities...
example.tran: 我们为失去多座城市而痛心。

example.ex: She mourned for the beloved past.

means.word_mean: 2. observe the customs of mourning after the death of a loved one

auth_sentence.content: His colleagues continued to mourn his loss Thursday.
auth_sentence.res_content: His colleagues continued to mourn his loss Thursday.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: His colleagues continued to mourn his loss Thursday.

auth_sentence.content: He said the strike is also to mourn the dead.
auth_sentence.res_content: He said the strike is also to mourn the dead.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He said the strike is also to mourn the dead.

auth_sentence.content: Such dreams are given...To solace them that mourn.
auth_sentence.res_content: Such dreams are given...To solace them that mourn.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Such dreams are given...To solace them that mourn.

sentences.en: The couple mourned for their dead child.
sentences.cn: 这对夫妻哀悼死去的孩子。

sentences.en: She mourned the loss of her brother.
sentences.cn: 她因为失去了哥哥而悲痛。

jushi.english: The couple mourned for their dead child.
jushi.chinese: 这对夫妻哀悼死去的孩子。

jushi.english: She mourned the loss of her brother.
jushi.chinese: 她因为失去了哥哥而悲痛。
